attributes.action: Save the Vale of Leven Hospital GP Out of Hours Service
attributes.background:
22/02/17

A vital Vale Hospital service was shut for the third Sunday in a row after the health board couldn’t find enough doctors to staff it.

This has to be resolved something needs to be done!!!! The services at the Vale of Leven Hospital are a godsend to the people of this area

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
